decision_content.verbatim_text:
ARBITRATION
Please refer to section ‘Dispute Resolution’ below.
decision_content.plain_text: For details on arbitration, refer to the 'Dispute Resolution' section below.
decision_content.expert_insight: This statement acts as a cross-reference, indicating that the specific procedures and conditions for arbitration are not detailed here but are instead located within the 'Dispute Resolution' section. Parties seeking to understand arbitration processes should consult that designated section, as arbitration is considered a component of a larger dispute resolution framework.
decision_content.justification: The text explicitly directs the reader to another section for comprehensive information on arbitration.
decision_content.implication_company: The company must ensure that the 'Dispute Resolution' section is comprehensive, accurate, and clearly details all aspects of arbitration, as it is the primary reference point for this topic.
decision_content.implication_supplier: The supplier will be directed to the 'Dispute Resolution' section to understand the agreed-upon arbitration process, terms, and requirements.
decision_content.source_insight: This instruction serves as a navigational aid within the document, ensuring that related topics are consolidated and easily locatable under a broader framework.

decisions.rationale: Consensus: All agents agreed on the type 'OTHER' and subtype 'INSTRUCTION'. Value Assessment: The text is clear, self-sufficient, and provides crucial navigational context regarding the location of arbitration details. It passes the 'So What?' test by directing users to essential information. Type-Specific Criteria: As an 'OTHER' (Instruction), it accurately serves as a cross-reference within the document. The 'plain_text' is well-contextualized. Utility Check: This finding is highly useful as it guides readers to the specific section detailing arbitration, which is a critical contractual element. The full 'verbatim_text' from Agent 2 and 3, including 'ARBITRATION', provides complete context.

content.verbatim_text:
ARBITRATION
Please refer to section ‘Dispute Resolution’ below.
content.plain_text: For details on arbitration, readers are instructed to refer to the 'Dispute Resolution' section of the document.
content.expert_insight: This statement acts as a cross-reference, indicating that arbitration is a component of the broader dispute resolution framework and its specific terms and conditions will be found in the designated section. Stakeholders should consult the 'Dispute Resolution' section for comprehensive information on arbitration processes, scope, and applicability.
content.justification: The text explicitly directs the reader to another section for information on 'ARBITRATION'.
content.implication_company: The company must ensure that the 'Dispute Resolution' section is complete and accurately addresses all aspects of arbitration, as this is the primary source of information for this topic.
content.implication_supplier: Suppliers should note that any arbitration-related terms and conditions affecting them will be detailed within the 'Dispute Resolution' section, and they should review that section thoroughly.
content.source_insight: The instruction serves as a navigational aid within the document, ensuring that related topics are consolidated and easily locatable.
